alert.note: Alert for Finney; Grant; Kearny; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kearny, Finney, northeastern Grant, south central Scott, northern Gray and northern Haskell Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 742 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Plymell, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. Widespread heavy rain. SOURCE...Automated equipment. Ulysses measured a wind gust of 51 mph at 742pm CDT. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plymell around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Holcomb and Garden City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas.
